content: The first thing you'll see as you go to the right is the Flamlings that sit in the lava. These will spit fire at you, so it's best to deal with them to remove the ranged attacks while you explore.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
The first thing you'll see as you go to the right is the Flamlings that sit in the lava. These will spit fire at you, so it's best to deal with them to remove the ranged attacks while you explore.
